tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE iris_scans (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    person_id INT,
    iris_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE individuals (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  iris_scan BYTEA,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE iris_scans (
    scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    individual_id INT,
    scan_date TIMESTAMP,
    scan_results BYTEA,
    FOREIGN KEY (individual_id) REFERENCES individuals(individual_id)
);

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    individual_id INT,
    scan_id INT,
    permission_level INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (individual_id) REFERENCES individuals(individual_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES iris_scans(scan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    individual_id INT,
    scan_id INT,
    access_date TIMESTAMP,
    access_result BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (individual_id) REFERENCES individuals(individual_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES iris_scans(scan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE iris_scans (
    person_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    iris_data BLOB
)

CREATE TABLE persons (
    person_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name TEXT,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE permissions (
    permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    access_level INT,
    person_id UUID REFERENCES persons(person_id)
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    person_id UUID REFERENCES persons(person_id),
    action TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_cameras (
    camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location TEXT,
    person_id UUID REFERENCES persons(person_id)
)
